entry.title: [Ubuntu] 12.04 Install Oracle Java
entry.content:
sudo rm /var/lib/dpkg/info/oracle-java7-installer*
sudo apt-get purge oracle-java7-installer*
sudo rm /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*java*
sudo apt-get update
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:webupd8team/java
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install oracle-java7-installer

entry.title: [Java] Hex String & Byte Array 轉換
entry.content:
public String toHexString(byte[] in){
    BigInteger temp = new BigInteger(in);
  return temp.toString(16);
}

public byte[] fromHexString(String in){
    BigInteger temp = new BigInteger(in, 16);
  return temp.toByteArray();
}
